sqlList.sql: select Count(*) from (select su.id, su.UNIT_NAME, count(suh.hotel_id), su.INVOICE_NAME, su.SETTLEMENT_PER, su.SETTLEMENT_TEL from t_lm_settlement_unit su left join T_LM_SETTLEMENT_UNIT_HOTEL suh on su.id=suh.unit_id left join t_lm_b_prop bp on suh.hotel_id = bp.prop where ((:UnitName IS NULL) OR (su.UNIT_NAME like '%'||:UnitName||'%')) AND ((:CityID IS NULL) OR (bp.cityid = :CityID)) AND ((:InvoiceName IS NULL) OR (su.INVOICE_NAME like '%'||:InvoiceName||'%')) group by su.id,su.UNIT_NAME,su.INVOICE_NAME,su.SETTLEMENT_PER,su.SETTLEMENT_TEL ) dt

select su.id AS UNITID, su.UNIT_NAME AS UNITNAME, to_char(count(suh.hotel_id))||'家' AS HOTELNM, su.INVOICE_NAME AS INVOICENM, su.SETTLEMENT_PER AS PER, su.SETTLEMENT_TEL AS TEL from t_lm_settlement_unit su left join T_LM_SETTLEMENT_UNIT_HOTEL suh on su.id=suh.unit_id left join t_lm_b_prop bp on suh.hotel_id = bp.prop where ((:UnitName IS NULL) OR (su.UNIT_NAME like '%'||:UnitName||'%')) AND ((:CityID IS NULL) OR (bp.cityid = :CityID)) AND ((:InvoiceName IS NULL) OR (su.INVOICE_NAME like '%'||:InvoiceName||'%')) group by su.id,su.UNIT_NAME,su.INVOICE_NAME,su.SETTLEMENT_PER,su.SETTLEMENT_TEL order by count(suh.hotel_id) desc

select distinct dt.UNITID,dt.UNITNAME, dt.INVOICENM,dt.PER,dt.TEL,dt.HOTELCN, case when dt.HOTELCN=1 then bp.prop_name_zh else dt.HOTELCN || '家' end AS HOTELNM from ( select su.id AS UNITID, su.UNIT_NAME AS UNITNAME, to_char(count(suh.hotel_id)) AS HOTELCN, su.INVOICE_NAME AS INVOICENM, su.SETTLEMENT_PER AS PER, su.SETTLEMENT_TEL AS TEL from t_lm_settlement_unit su left join T_LM_SETTLEMENT_UNIT_HOTEL suh on su.id=suh.unit_id left join t_lm_b_prop bp on suh.hotel_id = bp.prop where ((:UnitName IS NULL) OR (su.UNIT_NAME like '%'||:UnitName||'%')) AND ((:CityID IS NULL) OR (bp.cityid = :CityID)) AND ((:InvoiceName IS NULL) OR (su.INVOICE_NAME like '%'||:InvoiceName||'%')) group by su.id,su.UNIT_NAME,su.INVOICE_NAME,su.SETTLEMENT_PER,su.SETTLEMENT_TEL order by count(suh.hotel_id) desc ) dt left join T_LM_SETTLEMENT_UNIT_HOTEL suh on dt.UNITID=suh.unit_id left join t_lm_b_prop bp on suh.hotel_id = bp.prop and dt.HOTELCN=1 order by dt.HOTELCN desc

select id, unit_name, invoice_name, settlement_term,term_stdt, hotel_tax, settlement_address, settlement_per, settlement_tel, settlement_fax, settlement_sales, bill_item, hotel_taxno, hotel_payno, status, '' AS settlement_sales_nm from t_lm_settlement_unit where id=:UnitID

select suh.hotel_id AS HOTELID,bp.prop_name_zh AS HOTELNM, '' AS ODTYPE, suh.price_code AS PRICECD, suh.vendor AS VENDOR, '0' AS ACTYPE from t_lm_settlement_unit_hotel suh left join t_lm_b_prop bp on suh.hotel_id=bp.prop where suh.status='1' AND suh.unit_id = :UnitID

insert into t_lm_settlement_unit (id, unit_name, invoice_name, settlement_term,term_stdt, hotel_tax, settlement_address, settlement_per, settlement_tel, settlement_fax, settlement_sales, bill_item, hotel_taxno, hotel_payno, status, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time) values (:ID,:UNIT_NAME,:INVOICE_NAME,:SETTLEMENT_TERM,:TERM_STDT, :HOTEL_TAX,:SETTLEMENT_ADDRESS,:SETTLEMENT_PER,:SETTLEMENT_TEL,:SETTLEMENT_FAX,:SETTLEMENT_SALES,:BILL_ITEM,:HOTEL_TAXNO,:HOTEL_PAYNO,:STATUS,:CREATE_USER,sysdate,:CREATE_USER,sysdate)

update t_lm_settlement_unit set unit_name = :UNIT_NAME, invoice_name = :INVOICE_NAME, settlement_term = :SETTLEMENT_TERM, term_stdt = :TERM_STDT, hotel_tax = :HOTEL_TAX, settlement_address = :SETTLEMENT_ADDRESS, settlement_per = :SETTLEMENT_PER, settlement_tel = :SETTLEMENT_TEL, settlement_fax = :SETTLEMENT_FAX, settlement_sales = :SETTLEMENT_SALES, bill_item = :BILL_ITEM, hotel_taxno = :HOTEL_TAXNO, hotel_payno = :HOTEL_PAYNO, status = :STATUS, update_user = :CREATE_USER, update_time = sysdate where id = :ID
update t_lm_settlement_unit_hotel set status = '0', update_user = :CREATE_USER, update_time = sysdate where unit_id = :UNIT_ID

merge into t_lm_settlement_unit_hotel t1 using (select :UNIT_ID AS unit_id,:HOTEL_ID AS hotel_id,:PRICE_CODE AS price_code, :VENDOR AS vendor, :STATUS AS status, :CREATE_USER AS create_user from dual) t2 on (t1.unit_id = t2.unit_id and t1.hotel_id = t2.hotel_id) when matched then update set t1.price_code=t2.price_code,t1.vendor=t2.vendor,t1.status=t2.status,t1.create_user=t2.create_user,t1.create_time=sysdate,t1.update_user=t2.create_user,t1.update_time=sysdate where t1.unit_id = t2.unit_id and t1.hotel_id = t2.hotel_id when not matched then insert values (t2.unit_id, t2.hotel_id,t2.price_code,t2.vendor,t2.status,t2.create_user,sysdate,t2.create_user,sysdate)
